"To Help the Erzimarut":
"I have been told to collect Darker Factor.
I don't know why, but it is apparently
necessary to maintain life support on the
Erzimarut ship.
If human life is at stake, I cannot ignore it.
Still, we have to set a measurable goal.
I want you to subdue 50 Darkers.
That should be an easy task for you,
shouldn't it, Leader?
※Target Lv. 1+ enemies"
